email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to transport 8500MT of steel coils from Houston to Rotterdam on FOB terms. Could you provide a vessel option and an initial freight quote? Additionally, please confirm the laycan and any applicable demurrage rates.

Best regards,
Michael Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, DWT 75000, LOA 220m, currently available for your cargo. The initial freight quote is USD 45/MT. Laycan is 5-10 October. Demurrage is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Laura Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the quick response. The rate of USD 45/MT seems a bit high given the current market. Could you consider USD 40/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and any additional charges?

Best regards,
Michael Harris

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

After reviewing the market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 42/MT. The loading window is 72 hours, and there are no additional charges beyond the demurrage rate previously mentioned. Please let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT - Acceptance
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 42/MT. Please proceed with the booking and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Michael Harris

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Laura Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Michael Harris
